verse: Here is the story of Shem, Ham and Japheth. They were Noah’s sons. After the flood, they also had sons.
Sons were also born to Shem, Japheth’s younger brother. All the sons of Eber belonged to Shem’s family line.
These are the tribes of Noah’s sons. They are listed by their family lines within their nations. From them the nations spread out over the earth after the flood.
